credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
title: Image of St. Blaise
provenance: From the collection of Giovanni Piancastelli; Mr. and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee
medium: Brush and gray watercolor, pen and ink, pencil on paper.
description: St. Blaise kneeling and pointing at angels holding a tablet.  Near him on the ground two angels, one standing with the croizer, one sitting.  The mitre on the ground.  Inthe right corner below: "F. Mergolo"
name: Drawing
